biotools.summary:
Batch-Mask is an automated mask R-CNN workflow to isolate non-standard biological specimens for color pattern analysis. 
Batch-Mask utilizes a customized region-based convolutional neural network (R-CNN) model to generate masks of snakes in photographs.

bioschemas.name: Batch-Mask
